sentences: Draft SBI conclusions were discussed during informal consultations and a contact group.
The contact group meeting worked through the text paragraph-by-paragraph.
TUVALU expressed disappointment that his proposal for a special funding window for SIDS was not reflected.
However, delegates agreed to TUVALU's proposal to indicate that the draft COP/MOP decision would be completed, inter alia, with elements on institutional arrangements.
Similar wording was also added to a paragraph on continuing deliberations at SB 27.
The contact group then completed its work.
enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
